name: Catch Kitchen + Bar
address: 3866 Bayview St, Richmond BC V7E 4R7, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chill Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Chunks of juicy chicken tossed in a sweet & spicy chili sauce topped with crispy wontons.

hasMenuItem.name: Catch Roast Beef Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Slow-roasted beef, thinly sliced on a garlic toasted baguette, au jus & fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Crab Corn Chowder
hasMenuItem.description: Succulent crab, double smoked bacon, roasted corn, potatoes & loaded with veggies, served with oven-toasted bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Peppercorn New York Steak
hasMenuItem.description: 10 oz center cut AAA strip loin flame-grilled, topped with peppercorn sauce served with a warm potato salad & seasonal vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: Lobster Mac & Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Lobster & macaroni noodles, tossed in a three-cheese sauce topped with crispy onions served with rosemary focaccia.

hasMenuItem.name: Korean BBQ Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Sliced NY steak stir fried with wok vegetables in our Korean BBQ sauce served with rice and topped with crispy won tons.

hasMenuItem.name: Steak & Mushroom Salad
hasMenuItem.description: NY strip grilled, grape tomatoes, sautéed mushrooms on a bed of arugula topped with crispy onions, feta cheese & tossed with a champagne dijon vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Santa Fe Chicken Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Citrus pepper chicken breast, avocado, feta cheese, black beans, dates, and corn, drizzled with a cilantro lime vinaigrette & topped with tortilla strings.

hasMenuItem.name: Baja Fish Tacos
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh cod, coated in our crispy beer batter, spicy avocado & cilantro dressing finished with pico de gallo served with fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Crab,spinach and Artichoke Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Crab, spinach, and artichoke hearts combined with a mixture of cheeses topped with pico de gallo served with tortilla chips for dipping.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 6 oz house-made beef patty hand-pressed, grilled & topped with lettuce, tomato, onions, pickle & served on a toasted sesame bun with fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Tequila and Lime Prawns
hasMenuItem.description: Succulent prawns pan-seared with tequila fresh lime and spicy chipotle, topped with fresh cilantro. Served in a tortilla shell with pico de gallo.

hasMenuItem.description: NY strip grilled, grape tomatoes, sautéed mushrooms on a bed of arugula topped with crispy onions, feta cheese & tossed with a champagne dijon vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.description: Citrus pepper chicken breast, avocado, feta cheese, black beans, dates, and corn, drizzled with a cilantro lime vinaigrette & topped with tortilla strings.

hasMenuItem.name: Spinach & Strawberry Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Baby spinach, strawberries, pickled beets, candied walnuts, lime onions, and cranberries, topped with caramelized goat cheese, and sweet balsamic dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Warm Seafood Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Mixed seafood medley, potatoes, cherry tomatoes, red onion on a bed of mixed greens served with a raspberry vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Catch House Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Mixed greens, cucumber, tomato, onion, shredded carrots & beets, accompanied with a balsamic & dijon dressing.

hasMenuItem.description: Your choice of 3: Southern Fried Chicken, blackened, salmon, traditional burger, pulled pork.

hasMenuItem.name: Crab Cakes

hasMenuItem.description: Lightly glazed with soy sauce & chilies garnished with toasted sesame seeds.

hasMenuItem.name: Parmesan Garlic Truffle Yam Fries

hasMenuItem.description: Crab, spinach, and artichoke hearts combined with a mixture of cheeses topped with pico de gallo served with tortilla chips for dipping.

hasMenuItem.description: Slow-roasted beef, thinly sliced on a garlic toasted baguette, au jus & fries.

hasMenuItem.description: 10 oz center cut AAA strip loin flame-grilled, topped with peppercorn sauce served with a warm potato salad & seasonal vegetables.
